description: Tower of Hanoi with cyclic moves only (clockwise).
comments: This looks like sequence A(0,1;2,2;3) of the family of sequences [a,b:c,d:k] considered by G. Detlefs, and treated as A(a,b;c,d;k) in the W. Lang link given below. [_Wolfdieter Lang_, Oct 18 2010]a(n) = 2*A005666(n-1) + 1. - _Michel Marcus_, Nov 02 2012
